content.detailedDescription:
We were driving on the highway where the sky is completely visible with no trees. all the way towards the right, a bright light the size of an airplane and as bright as a planet suddenly appeared. when i saw it at first i yelled,
"look a shooting star!" quickly i realized it was not a star. most of the stars were hardly visible from light pollution. it didn't flicker or flash like stars, planes or towers. after about 1 second, it split into two and one light went up and one went down creating a sideways y. this was a perfect triangle formation. in about 1/3 of a second it completely disappeared. when the light divided into two they were equally as bright and big as the original one was. they disappeared in perfect sync, down to the millisecond. i'd estimate it was about 1/2-1 mile away. during the event, i didn't feel anything other than amazement and awe. after the event me and my father were at a loss for words. we tried to reason it off as a meteor or something logical, but nothing fit correctly. even my mother who is very educated in astrology didn't know how to explain it.
content.summary: Sphere brighter than star and bigger than meteor

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I photographed an orb and a triangular object over the las vegas strip with 3 red lights in an equilateral pattern following an orb (white in color). took a 2nd photo 30 sec later and found the orb & triangle object lowered in sky. i thought the weather cloud with rain was interesting because we don't get much here in vegas. the cloud was no larger than 1 block in size, that's why i photographed if, finding out later the orb and triangular object hidden inside. i just happened to wake up at 4am and went on my porch to have a cigarette when i saw the event.
content.summary: I captured photos of unusual cloud formation w/rain in las vegas maybe 1 block in size. after looking at photos i found an orb and a triangular shape hiding in the rain

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from chevron on woodside road heading southbound on el camino when i noticed two red glowing objects hovering over the corner of el camino real and valparaiso avenue.  i immediately made a left hand turn on glenwood ave and parked my car.  at first i thought they were low flying helicopters. i got out of the car and started filming the orbs.  the first of the videos were two glowing red, with a tinge of pink, with the center having a very orange glow.  when looking at these, the red was so intense that it appeared to look laser-like in the sky.  almost as if the light was beaming.  when i reviewed the film, the red glow and beaming red light was difficult to see, but they looked rather white and orange on video.  the two orbs did not cross over el camino real where i was, but stayed on the west side then crossed over el camino near santa cruz avenue and continued southbound till the lights slowly faded into nothing.  then another orb came out and did the same exact thing. this happened maybe four or five times, and every time it was one orb at a time.  one of the videos shows an orb tracking a plane which was above the orb, and then the plane continue on its path and so did the orb.  the last time i saw something with this glow was back in 1997 in san jose, ca, which came out of the monterey area.  the weekend before this, i took a trip to monterey, ca and reminisced that sighting i had in san jose, ca.  the following day i returned from my trip, i had this recent sighting.  my feelings after i had this recent sighting were amazement, excitement, and joy.  prior to this recent ufo sighting, i had been experiencing extreme intuition and clairvoyance.  however, during the time of intuition and clairvoyance, i was also feeling a lot of frustration and introspective thoughts regarding relationships and loved ones.  i understand this all sounds strange, but before every ufo experience there always seems to be emotional conflict on some level within myself and loved ones.  explaining the sightings with others seems to clear up all conflict and harmonize all negative emotions.
content.summary: I saw 6 red glowing spheres that came from the north west area of woodside and atherton.

content.detailedDescription: Was chillin with my brother in front of my house in my car around 530 when i noticed a light thru my sunroof in the sky and thought to myself that it was the north star, then i saw it moving towards my direction so i thought ooo maybe it's an airplane, since i see them flying over my house all the time. after about 5 minutes it was still in the same spot so i thought ooooooook maybe i didn't see it move and it is a star. now that light has my attention cause i was sure it was an airplane moving towards me but it seems to be staying in the same spot, so i tell my brother "hay, is that a helicopter or what cause it looks like it's moving towards us but at the same time staying in the same spot" so now my brother and i are starting at this light and as it starts to get darker we can see it better and now we're debating on if it was a helicopter cause it was flying with no direction,  no! its way to high to be a helicopter,  its about as high as those airplanes that release chemical trails.  it was moving at a very slow speed and then fast and then slow not going in any particular direction, almost like it was parallel parking in the sky, at around 7ish it was like 10 or more lights that just appeared and looked like stars but then they all seemed to move as a unit,  i had to go get my gf from work around then so i was unable to keep watching but they seemed to stay in the same spot moving slowly then a rapid acceleration to a complete stop, if you looked up at the wrong time you would think it was just stars (to much detail to type but definitely a lot more happened)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Hovering and crazy pattern light/lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, my oldest son called me out side, he seen a bright, very bright object in the sky, i got my camera and started recording it, it started on the right side of my house in the front and disappeared on the left side of my house. i do not know the n,s,e,w directions from the front of my house. it did not make no sound, my father in law thought it did but it was a truck. this thing was bright white, left no trail, no sound nothing, the video i was able to get only lasted 35 seconds, that's how fast it was moving, i lost sight of it near the front of my housing area. 

it was moving fast in like a straight line, didn't make no sudden moves, or anything till it was near the front of my housing area, then it did a jumping motion and was gone.

i didn't know what it was, only what i thought it could be, a ufo.

the video is on my facebook page, i do not know how to pull the video off  to link it on here, will be willing to show video, to a certain extent.

i do not have original copy on my camera anymore, youngest child broke it.
content.summary: I have a video of the event. will be willing to show it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down black's side road going to pick up my dog from the kennel around 6pm. it is dark here at that time in february. i noticed something rising up out of a field over a house roughly 150-200 metres away. it was the colour of fire, so i watched in case it was embers coming from the house and i should call someone. but it was just this one orb, not quite perfectly round, slowly rising, and now that i was stopped and had the window down i noticed there was no sound. it was west of me and rose up moving in an easterly direction. by the time it was overhead it was up nearer to the patches of low hanging clouds. when it was directly overhead (i was hanging out the window to keep watching) it instantly turned off it's glow, but i could still see a shadow moving under the clouds. i don't think it was necessarily casting a shadow, i think i was just seeing the object itself without its light. this was my second sighting of what seemed very clearly to be a non man made flying object, and as i was watching it i said "who are you? are you just saying hello?" "hello" and right at that moment its light went out.
content.summary: Fire coloured orb rose up from field near/over house. ascended to just under clouds and traveled east overhead

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving around and i look up and see two very bright rust orange colored orbs in the sky. i stop the car because i have never seen anything like them before. they were very bright, very large (bigger than the stars), and orange. they did not pulse and by the time my friend looked up to see what was freaking me out the orb on the left faded away. while we were both watching, the orb on the right started emitting bright orange sparks off the bottom of it that seemed to fall to the earth (like little orbs with tails). it would stop giving off these sparks and then start again every 10 seconds or so. eventually the bright orb stopped giving off sparks and started to fade but as it faded it moved back and forth in the sky and then a tail appeared on it and it disappeared.
content.summary: Rust orange lights emitting smaller orbs

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cloudy night, close to midnight.  i had just stepped out of my car to get some fresh air as i waited for a friend to come out of the house.  as i often do, i looked around the environment for any interesting signs or patterns which i could derive meaning out of in connection to my life experience in that moment.  syncronistly, earlier that day my daughter put a picture, drawn and colored with crayon, she found while cleaning her room, on my desk which, to me, looked like a ufo against the dark night sky and give me a feeling that my first, very anticipated, ufo sighting was at hand. so, with these feelings brewing inside me, i looked around for a sign.  after a few seconds, i found, in the dirt behind my car, what looked like a shape drawn into the dirt, closely resembeling the ufo in the picture my daughter gave me (triangular shaped with a smaller triangle hovering seperately).  as soon as i saw it, a thought and feeling came upon me, urging me to look up.  so, i did and, sure enough, there it was.  i thought it might be a plane at first with its lights set and blinking as it flew its path, but as i observed it, i noticed a red center light with blue lights at either sided which began to circle the object as it moved along.  then, as the reality set in that this could actually be a real ufo, my inclination was confirmed as i watched it stop in mid-flight and begin to manuever in ways that only a ufo can, as far as i know.  it came slowly back towards me then quickly changed direction and went back the other way again.  then, it hovered for a moment and descended- i could not tell how far down because there was a big two-story house in the way.  full of wonder, amazement, and gratefulness, a hurried back towards the road to get a better vantage point from which i might see it.  then, i began calling out quietly but with a firm focused intent, "i'm here, i'm here..." (i remembered learning that raising ones vibration to be more in tune with theirs often brings them back).  it worked!  it came back up and moved towards me, close enough for me to hear a pulsating hum coming from it, as if to acknowledge that it was aware of my presence and my awareness of it.  then, it did something truly amazing! it hovered back to where it first descended, but this time it shot straight up into the clouds to where all i could see was a dim reddish glow - it looked like a star.  "is this how they camaflauge themselves at times?", i thought.  then, it descended back down again and i had a feeling the experience had finished.
i am so grateful and honored to have been given that opportunity to be witneess to the grace and spectacle of that amazing extraterrestrial craft.
i will definately be looking forward to seeing them again if and when our vibrations once again align.  thank you. thank you. thank you.
content.summary: Was alone.  was traveling almost planelike until i noticed it, then it began to move back and forth and hover.  it seemed to have notice me and responded to my call, "here i am" by coming close enough to hear the hum.  red light center, blue lights outer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog back in from being outside. and i noticed a white flash while the object? was moving to the right of my house. it flashed  every 5 seconds. and it's wasn't flashing any other colors. it was bright enough that i could see it in the clouds. 

the flashes where not triangle or squared shaped. it seemed to be a bit roundish, curved a little bit. the object made no sound what so ever. i was only able to watch it for about 1 minute. it also moved slowly.
content.summary: Flashning without a sound

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My friend was driving and i was in the passenger seat my sister was sitting right behind me and we were westbound toward deming nm on march 16th 2008 at about 3;15 am. the moon was bright and it was a scattered cloudy night. something caught my eye out the passenger window toward the north. i saw a green streak of light dropping below the broken cloud cover it was flickering in intensity and saw small white light fragments breaking away and dropping out below it. i said ohh, ohh, ohh, and was pointing toward it when the green light disappeared and my sister and friend looked where i was pointing. the green streak of light appeared again, but brighter then before. the green light had changed direction and as it started to climb in altitude it start to accelerate. the green streak was like a cheap special effect from the movie tron and didn't look like anything burning, but like it was bleeding off steadily. by this time all of us were staring at the object. it was now visible through the front windshield of the truck by me and it was rising at an angle of about 30 degrees when there was a whitish flash and then it started slowing down and dropping altitude again. this time it was dropping at a angle of 70 degrees or so. it was flickering in intensity then the light just went out. this all took place with in a span of 6 or 7 seconds.
content.summary: Saw an object that was falling below the clouds and breaking apart, it glowed bright changed direction and accelerated up then fell again and blinked out

content.detailedDescription: On feb. 12th 2012 around 2 am i stepped out onto my balcony to check the weather before i go walk my dog. as i was looking into the clear night sky, a portal opened up & a glowing ball of light dropped from it & as it descended to earth it left a staggered trail of light.I live on the top floor(7th)in my hi-rise & i'm situated on good sized hill so i'd say this event happened over the china basin part of the s.F. bay.The portal happened right before my eyes & it looked like a slow-motion blast or explosion which consisted of about 10-12 rays or streams of light or plasma energy.The whole sighting only lasted about 4 seconds.I know it wasn't any rogue firework because i would've seen a trail of smoke coming from it as it was being shot up into the sky,but there was nothing like that.This thing happened right before my eyes out of nowhere & it was totally silent from start to finish.Also the streams of light coming from the portal were thicker and had a more solid look to them,compared to that of a big 4th of july firework.The sky wasn't lit up or anything though.The rays of light faded out while the glowing ball was falling and leaving this trail of staggered energy.And it fell straight down to either the ocean or land.I couldn't tell because it kind of faded into the horizon.I apologize for taking so long to report this.On the same day in 2013 & 2014 i tried to see if would happen again by setting up my camera to record the sky for 2 hours(at 2 am) but had no luck.I was awestruck when this happened & have only heard about something similar like this from the skinwalker ranch events.
content.summary: A portal opened up & a ball of light fell from it leaving a trail of plasma energy or light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was in the kitchen and saw a flashing light through the window, above a hill near my apartment. 
i started thinking it is a balloon popping some fireworks. 
it was stationary, with a blinking light for 3 minutes or less. then it disappeared. 2 minutes later, it started flashing again, but a few degrees to the left, and moving from left to right very slowly. then it disappeared again.
content.summary: Random blinking light

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from dinner tonight, we noticed how clear and bright the sky looked. my wife and i decided to spend some time in the hot tub. we both enjoy watching the skyline gazing for shooting stars and meteor showers. as i was looking up into the skyline, i noticed something flying right above us. it appeared to be in transparent form. i only witnessed the object for a few seconds as our house sits very close to the hot tub and by the time i noticed it, it was pretty much over our house and out of site. the object was flying south to north. i asked my wife "do you see that?" followed by "what is that?" she didn't notice or see anything. she replied "what did it look like?" stunned and almost speechless, i stated "very odd���looked like a cluster of stars flying in triangular, transparent like formation"

she said "if i were to tell you that same story, you'd think i was crazy" 
she's right, i would have!! lol

but the fact is, i saw it!! 

there was no sound and no sign of any vapor trail. it appeared to be very large and flying at an altitude of approx. 10,000-15,000 feet, maybe even lower. i did see what appeared to be a traditional commerical  airline, with blinking lights, flying at a higher altitude of 30,000 or higher, right above this transparent object. the unidentified object appeared to be flying at a much faster speed than the airplane. 

in closing, i'll admit, i'm a skeptic when it comes to ufos. i have witnessed several shooting stars, meteors, satellites, fireballs and even the space station. until tonight, ive never witnessed what i thought was a ufo. but what i saw tonight was like nothing ive ever seen before. i can't explain it, but it truly changed my way of thinking... 

please help explain!!
content.summary: Object looked transparent. looked like a cluster of stars flying in formation.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside mcdonalds saying our goodnights, noticed three orange pulsating lights flying in an elongated v formation, then four following in a straight line formation, then another 7 in groups of 3 and four, when they were almost overhead they hovered and changed direction from se to sw accelerated away and faded out. this lasted for about 10 minutes, there were about a dozen people looking up and watching the objects, the local police helicopter flew over head and was headed towards the nw, there were several small planes in sky (strobe lights) these objects were above them.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Group of lights in sky, hovered then changed direction, flew away and faded out

content.detailedDescription: on the 4th of july of last year(13)i as watching fireworks with a comunity of friend's on  a beach by the name of bastendorf.Its about 2 miles south of where i live.The beach is all sand,a quarter of a mile long ,faces west,jetty on the north ,water to the west,rock wall to south,enterace road and small trees(about 100 yqrds)then a 75 foot bluff extense all.My experience is not a sighting of a u.F.O. but a contact(that i believe)that i had with about 60 human like entities.I was not drinking and was about ready to go home when a friend wanted me to go with him down the beach with him even sayed he'd been looking for me and this was inportant.So no big deal,thought we were  maybe chasing girl's or something at another group of people down the beach.(this is hard for me so please excuse my grammar and detail,i just feel now it is important  for me to tell others,and it's starting to affect me schycologically.)this is where it gets strange.It was suppose to be a party around a camp fire.But they werent "around " the camp fire,more like,or exacatly like a tear drop shape,with one side of the tear next to the fire.I'll send illustration.There was a d.J and table with a stereo about 100 feet up the beach from the fire.Not one person near or dancing.All were gathered in the shape of a tear drop next to fire,with most of them facing in ,and standing really close to one another.No drink's in hands or anything to that matter.My friend took me to the group,around one side and into the groups center.They just kinda sepparated and let us in.He introduced me to a coulpe of people who smiled but did not speak.(this was happening all in a couple min.)after shaking a couple peoples hands,a darker complexted maybe indian or part mexican person with a backpack on reached his hand out to shake,and my friend steps in points his finger inches away from this persons face and say's "we don't know him",but he was obviously in the group.At that time i followed my friend out the side of the gathering where we had come in.I could here him wispering to someone"hey you got any girls ready to go right now?"the other person pointed towards the end of the tear drop,thats where we went,where there was a girl my friend grabbed her from her(person she as with a man")arm and sayed your coming with me,she sayed allright,we started to leave a guy came and sayed no your not and grabbed her back.It as all really strange at that point we left.It was like my friend knew exacatly why and who they were and was stealing a woman from them for me (?)i as just along for the ride (walk).This really frightened me but have never told anyone that.I have confronted my friend and all he sayes is yea that was cool huh.Allthe people there were all dressed casual and were looking like rich yuppies or kids of.The way it was like a "hive"is what scarred me the most,and the fact my friend has something to do with it.The way they were gathered and how they acted and stood was not normal.I've been to a lot of parties on this beach and do drink on occation ,not this night.I'm gonna try to draw an illustration of the group,for now i'm done getting upset,thank's for listening.Jon oxford,nautical art and photography.(ex-commercial fisherman for over 20 years)
content.summary: I saw no craft,but was led into a group of people (?)where i was introduced.These were not normal people.In that what they were doing was not correct.

content.detailedDescription: Birds were going crazy.. chirping in the nest// in the distance behind the trees. shooting star. meteor....... just that fast.. white /yellow. orange.Looked like roman candle with no pop!
content.summary: Meteor/ burned in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard and saw a reflective object moving across the southern sky heading east.  clear sky and very high altitude, thought it was the space station because there was no trail from the engine and moving fast across the sky.  after watching it moving across the sky i noticed it was followed by two military jets leaving exhaust trails and the object was leaving no trail, this got me thinking that this was not normal. i could tell by the military jet trails that one jet had two trails and the other had four trails (engines).  i could see the object was moving faster than the military jets because the distance was getting greater between them as i watched.  i watched as they headed east then moved to the front yard to watch again but they were too far across the horizon.  i went to the back yard and saw another military jet lagging behind on the same course.
content.summary: Reflective objet that i thought could be the space station, seemed to be the size of a millitary jet.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the back patio to call my cat and had a need to relieve my self and was looking up at the stars when i saw this star start going up and down back and forth and would shoot out to the right and then go back to where it had been  it moved very fast.  i called my wife out to look at it and it started doing it for her.  i went into the house several times because it was cold.  when i would go back out it would not be moving and would  start doing its moves again until i went into the house.  this object appeared to be the size of a small star but was bright.  i just went back out  to see if it was still there and it was and started doing the same moves after i had looked at it for 5 seconds or so.  it kind of reminded me of a bat chasing bugs in and out of a light. fast moves but i could see it all the time as it quickly moved back and forth.  i though it was a star until it started moving up and down and back and forth.  it sometimes would shoot of at a right angle toward the west and then go back to same spot it had started from.  the only feeling i had was of surprise at seeing it and the fact that it is staying around and doing the same thing over and over like it is seeing me watch it as it stops doing it's thing until i come back out side to look again.  i have gone back out side at 8:17 and it is still there and started doing the same thing.  i wish someone else that believes in these things could be here to see this it
content.summary: White light like a star but moved quickly up down back and forth. when back to same spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking  and i hear a click  sound like a starting of  a car  going bad ...And  then ....I lost  time  for  )5sec ........Then i was back .Too my  mind ...I saw  a green teal light  hit the  tree ........For 19 sec .........Then  the ufo pull off ........I belive the ufo hit me with something i blink  for  a section ..........But  i seem alrite now tho .....I guess .....I was aloan walking  brookline st sw atl ga .About 10 pm ......Maybe it was a little  white in the teal green.Beam too ..But  it hit the tree the hold tree was cover in this light ....It couldnt have been a  spot light by owner that far up the tree .....I walk there all the time ....Im a ckeck too see .....If it a spot light there first ....If not then it  was a real  ufo tried too take me or eat me or just attack me or take me up on the ufo ...........It  was black gray color look like .
content.summary: feel the ufo was a brick shape ......Use a teal green beam of  light .It hit the tree in front yard ....And  the  sound with  the  light sound like a starter clicking .

content.detailedDescription:
I was drinking beer with my dad.
i noticed it in the corner of my eye because it seemed to be brighter than any star i've seen before that night.
i thought it was a star, but then another similar light appeared right next to it.
then they moved in a zigzag path in unison, and then it disappeared.
the whole time it happened i just sat there and observed it until the lights vanished.
content.summary: 1 orange pulsating light appeared, 30 seconds later another appeared close to it, more brighter than the surrounding stars. the 2 lights moved in a slow zigzag path briefly and then vanished at the same time.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a field investigator for mufon and i am always looking at the sky.  i am also an activist. each day i take 3 pictures of chemtrails/geoengineered trails in the sky. 
i was outside watering and was moving the hose from one position in my front yard to another approx. 20 feet to the east.  i looked up and saw 3-5 reflective discs wobbling. at first i thought them to be pieces of paper.
when they wobbled, i could see that the objects were a shade darker on the bottom than on top. the sky was completely clear and the temperature was about 75* with no noticeable wind. the longer i looked, the more disc shaped objects i saw. i saw at least 6-10 when they were last observed.
some objects were lower in altitude than the others.  i say this only because the lower objects were larger in size. the objects that were the highest in altitude were at approx. 45,000 to 50,000 feet... about the same as a military jet.  the lower objects were at about the altitude of a commercial jet.. approx. 30,000 feet. 
the size of all objects was starlike and reflected the sun brightly. when they wobbled, i felt as though they were spinning.  which, is most impossible to see because of altitude.  being at 90* above my head and floating slowly toward the ne, when i put the hose down and looked back up, they were nowhere to be seen. i observed the objects for approx. 30 seconds total.
i do not live in a commercial airline flight path. the only aircraft i see are military jets that spray chemtrails. there are no mountains near by or military installations within 100 miles. prescott airport is 6 miles se and no large aircraft fly out of this airport.
i saw the film footage of 100's of objects high in the mexican sky in daytime, and what i saw today immediately reminded me of this.
being an investigator, i have always gone outside and looked at the night sky saying.... show yourselves... i know what i saw.
content.summary: Outside watering at 14:40 and looked up to see numerous disc shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and i witnessed a yellow starlike object flying slowly not making a sound then i saw another small starlike object moving slowly after that one.There was a storm coming later on in the night and someone said that the local weather lab had drones up studying this storm before it hit at midnight last night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two small starlike objects flying in sky without making a sound(maybe a possible drone)

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my porch looking toward the northern sky - habit because i work at an airport in that direction; i know what type of aircraft are in the skies in and around this area.
i witnessed a fireball orb - at first i thought it should be falling because the "flames" were above the object as one would see a meteor tail following the meteor. however, the fireball orb was moving in a straight-line path with the "flames" proceeding it. the light from it did do illuminate it's path; no halo or other indication that the light was beaming from it.
i had my cell phone in my hands and started to tape it with my camera; did come out too clear because the night sky was dark, only saw a white orb on the video.
the fireball orb proceeded in a straight line toward the southwest, i followed it with my camera while walking west on the sidewalk. my camera battery died soon after; only got about a minute and 1/2 of video.
there are large trees on the street adjacent to mine and the orb past over them - i thought i was going to lose sight so i decided to cross the street for a better view - a car was coming so i trotted across to the next corner. after the car had pasted i looked over toward where i last saw the object. i couldn't see it because of the large two story building on the corner. i moved into the street to see if i could see it between the trees and the building. i could and it seemed stationary at that point. something caught my eye and i turned toward the west, down the street, and saw another object of the same description stationary in the sky about the same attitude. as i watched the second object it dimmed and disappeared. i turned to the first object and saw that it was still in the same location. within 3-4 seconds it dimmed and disappeared from my sight in the same manner as the first.
i live in an area that has a lot of air traffic and as mentioned above i am very familiar with the type of aircraft and the paths that they take.
these two objects were not anything that resembled planes, helicopters, blimps, kites, flares, comets, meteors etc.
very bizarre indeed.
content.summary: Fireball type object flying straight-line path

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside talking on my cell phone. i cannot recall the time of day, but it was dark outside. i happened to look up toward the n or nw direction and saw a red light/glowing red ball hovering in the air. it did not know what the objects was. i have spent 6 years in the military and have seen all kinds of flying vehicles while in the states and while deployed to a war zone and this was like nothing i had ever seen before. it made no noise, but seemed to agitate the dogs in my neighborhood as many of them started barking.

the red ball/light object hovered for about 30 seconds then abruptly broke into 2 identical red ball/light objects. immedicately after they separated both object started to flyaround eradically for approxiamtely 15-20 seconds then came back together forming 1 single object. i was standing by myself when i first noticed the object, but as the sighting continued 2 of my neighbors from up the street came running down to my location to view the sighting. we stood in silence while the object continued to divided into 2 objects, fly around eradically, then form back into 1 object. the red ball/light repeated this process 3 or 4 times before fading out.

the only thing i could think that the object could have been was a ufo. neither my neighbors nor myself had ever seen anything like that before and we were the only ones outside at the time of the incident. ironically i had never met these neighbors before and i have sinced moved from the location and never have seen them again.
content.summary: Red ball ufo divided into 2 objects then came back together into 1 object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend where driving in brabourne in kent england,at first i thought i saw two very bright stars,one remained stationery,and one changed direction and darted around,when we got closer i noticed that i could see what appeared to be very large windows and extremely bright light emmited from within the crafts,the craft themselves looked similar to a very large posh caravan but with what looked like very plain and bright inside, as we where watching both of these crafts,i turned to get a better view and one of them had disappeared and only the stationary one was left which then started moving,they moved as if they where a gyroscope so it could change direction in any manner necessary,it darted off and out of my view quicker than anything i have ever seen move,within minutes n military chopper flew past in the same direction it was a chinoock helicopter,very distinct and loud i could see that as clear as i saw the crafts,there have been many in my area recently and this has got me asking questions,i hope one day il get answers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Caravan shaped ufos 2 of them,one stattionary one changed direction like flying offices

content.detailedDescription:
unfortunately, it is part of my personality that i do not usually make special note of dates and exact times. i have seen this aircraft twice, maybe a year apart. i know it was early spring or late fall on both occasions,(first in 2012 and then early in 2013) because in the early morning hours the weather was very pleasant following pretty cold weather,   and i was comfortable sitting on my back porch enjoying a cigar. on both occasions i was restless and unable to sleep so i got up, put on some clothes and went outside to smoke a cigar. after a short time, about half of the cigar, a light above me caught my eye. i looked up and saw an aircraft. it surprised me because there was no sound and the plane seemed to be flying very slowly and at a low altitude. whoever was piloting it did not seem concerned about being seen, maybe because of the hour. it was just coming into view passing over the building i live in and moving in a straight line to the east/north east, toward interstate 81. i actually had the thought that i should go inside and get my phone or video camera, but i never moved, wanting to keep watching to see what would happen. it almost seemed to be gliding, but i felt that it was moving under power because the speed and altitude did not change while i was watching it. it did not take off with great speed or disappear,  it just flew slow and steady in a straight line until it was out of sight. i've been looking for and waiting to hear other reports of similar sightings and have found no such reports.

  as i said, it was shaped like an airplane but it did not look normal to me. what was instantly obvious was the long rectangular light or maybe lighted window on the bottom of the fuselage that ran from the nose about 1/3 of the length of the vehicle and the only wings i could see were at the far rear of the fuselage and they each had a large , white light on the end. even though the three light sources seemed quite bright, and the aircraft was flying quite low, i did not notice light being cast to the ground from them. i saw no propeller or exhaust, and although there is a railroad track a block from my building there was no train or other sound to drown the sound of this aircraft, but i heard nothing.
  
  my first impression of this vehicle is not that it is extra terrestrial, but i've never seen anything like it. the sketch i attached is an approximation of the appearance of the aircraft. i don't remember the exact length of the rear wings or the rectangular light relative to the length of the body. i have waited to report this sighting because i expect to see it again, maybe this coming spring and i wanted to have an actual photo or video to present. if that happens i will certainly send it to you.  

  if it is a known aircraft, i would be happy to be educated about it. it seemed large for any drone i've heard of, but that was my thought, some kind of surveillance vehicle.
content.summary: It was an airplane shaped object, but the only wings were at the far rear of the fuselage. a long rectangular light on the bottom front portion about 1/3 the length, almost the full width of the fuselage.

content.detailedDescription: On the telephone, looked in the sky to the south.  saw blur in orange.  put on glasses and became clear, but was still just an orange light.  moved very slowly, too slow to be a small prop plan. there was no noise at all.  there were no flashing port or starb lights, there was only an orange light.  it moved in front of me for 3 to 5 minutes and then it turned east toward the atlantic ocean shortly after the change in course it vanished.
content.summary: Very slow moving orange light,  no known aircraft lighting flashes

content.detailedDescription: i was driving on 45n/beltway 8 and saw a bring light off to my right. being close to iah i was thinking it was plan, but no a plan went right by it and the light didn't have those red and green side blinking lights. could it be a star, maybe. a super bright one but ita possible. it didn't move or change any color but it didn't look natural at all. i have seen maybe things around the houston area,  i would love to know what is really going on.
content.summary: Driving into work and saw a bright light

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At around 3:!0 am new years day myself and 3 others got out of a cab a few houses down from where we live. i immediately spotted what i thought were 2 thai/chinese wishing lanterns floating in the sky. i made this snap judgement before i cast my direct gaze upon them. as soon as i looked directly at them (a fraction of a second later) i immediately knew they were not lanterns. i've seen millions of lanterns in my life (i've been in many parts of asia for their respective new years), and these two lights were moving so steadily and uniformly with each other that i initially thought they were two lights on one craft. there were no clouds, but i assume they were in very low airspace. if it were a plane, or craft from our planet, it would've been low enough to be very loud. however, they were much higher than the tree tops. in the initial moments of trying to figure out what they were, i noticed that in between the two lights i could see stars, so it was not one craft, but rather two separate orbs, moving in unison together. the light they were emitting was unwavering and steady- dissimilar to a lantern. the light was contained within their shape, unlike a streetlight's light that radiates out. in the first moments of realizing we were seeing something spectacular, we started to get excited and pointed, one friend got cell phone footage. as we walked further into the streetlight they stopped moving toward us (in a ne direction). they hovered for about a half a second, and started moving around and interacting closely with each other at ease. about a minute later one of the orbs shot upward towards to stars very quickly. because there was a streetlight in our vision it was difficult to perceive it's departure. the second light hung around for a few minutes, then slowly and steadily moved upward until it blended in with the stars. that departure took a few minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two intense orange orbs of light, moving uniformly with each other, then noticed us and interacted intelligently around each other

content.detailedDescription: Looked like it was cloaked.
content.summary: Looked like a boomarang.  cloaked
